dance.util.logs¶

Set up logger

Functions

get_logger(filename[, level])

get a logger given a name (like __file__) Uses the last part of the path less the extension as the name.
dance.util.logs.get_logger(filename, level=20)¶

get a logger given a name (like __file__) Uses the last part of the path less the extension as the name. Defaults to log level INFO.
